text: Gordon Keith Mackenzie Moyes (17 November 1938 - 5 April 2015) was an Australian Christian evangelist, broadcaster and politician. From 3 September 2002 to 4 March 2011, he was a member of the New South Wales Legislative Council, first for the Christian Democratic Party until March 2009. From November 2009, he was the Family First Party's only parliamentary representative in New South Wales. Moyes was born in Melbourne, Victoria. He was married and had four children. Moyes died on 5 April 2015 in Sydney, aged 76. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Australian Christian clergy Category:Evangelists Category:Independent politicians in Australia Category:Order of Australia Category:Politicians from Melbourne Category:Politicians from Sydney
title: Gordon Moyes
